snippet: Rory McIlroy birdied his last two holes to post a five-under-par 67, leaving him two shots off the lead after two rounds of the Abu Dhabi Championship.
abstract: Craig Lee and Rafa Cabrera-Bello share second-round lead at the Abu Dhabi Championship, with Rory McIlroy two shoes back; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy birdied his last two holes to post a five-under-par 67, leaving him two shots off the lead after two rounds of the Abu Dhabi Championship.
